Articles.Content:
Here is a cargo plane I made yesterday, it has the ability to drop 2 controllable cars. The cars can have 2 railguns mounted onto them. Sadly there is a bit of trouble with the forward car and it doesn\'t seem to release properly so all goes haywire when it is released as shown in video.

Enjoy

Mods used: Mechjeb, Cart mod and http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=14831.0
Very cool! Will DL as soon as I build a similar, interplanetary design.
This is really cool. I love how it looks, how it flies (based on the video - haven\'t tried), and the construction must\'ve been a challenge.
ya its relly good but when i try to start it up it says that i need a part from mechjeb evan thogh its installed
Maybe you haven\'t got the latest mechjeb? It needs the 0.25m ish mechjeb part to go on the front of each command module
this is the one i got : 1.8.4.0 (and if you can give me a link to the latest virsion pleese do)
nevermind i re installed it and it is in there and work in g except that it\'s now asking for a stack decupuler now

Tis\' a strange aircraft. But cool.

The wings look far too short.

nevermind i re installed it and it is in there and work in g except that it\'s now asking for a stack decupuler now

If you redownload that should be fine now, I took out the stack decoupler, it wasn\'t necessary I just forgot to take it out.
No way I just made a bomber that drops 2 trucks from the sky
what is the final addon, the link doesn't work anymore
